des:
OPPLE Home skill is used to control OPPLE smart devices, including lights, switches, fan lamps, etc. For OPPLE lights, you can adjust color temperature and brightness with this skill. Besides, you can also use the scenes you created in the OPPLE Home.

Here’s a step by step guide:
(1) Download our “OPPLE Home” APP and register a new account.
(2) Turn on OPPLE smart devices and add them to OPPLE smart home system. You can also rename devices.
(3) Create scenes and automations according to your daily usage.
(4) Download Amazon “Alexa” APP and connect Echo with “Alexa” APP, then find the skill of “OPPLE Home” in “Alexa” APP.
(5) Click “Enable skill” in the “OPPLE Home” skill page, then input your account info of "OPPLE Home" APP
(6) Wait Alexa to sync OPPLE devices and set rooms.

After you’ve synced OPPLE devices successfully in the Alexa APP, you can control them by talking to Alexa.
To turn on/off lights, say “Alexa, turn on/off living room lights.”
To set brightness, say “Alexa, make the bedroom lights brighter/dimmer.”, or say “Alexa, set the kitchen to 50%.”
To set color temperature, say “Alexa, make the bedroom cooler/warmer.”
To set fan speed, say “Alexa, set the fan lamp speed to 30 (use a number from 1-100).”
To use scenes, say” Alexa, trigger/turn on “meeting” (name of the scene)”
